name: spring-cloud-config
description: NodeJS application configuration using similar style to Spring Config and using the Spring Cloud Config Server for remote property sources.

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha ./test/**/*test.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Matthew Ross
